Articles.Content:
Meet my new VTOL-probe. Unmanned. Tested with NEAR. 

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/Psy8V)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/XZzfU)

I call her Yidhra.
I am in process of turning her into an interplanetary ship. Possibly VTOL SSTO capable of reaching Laythe... and back. Some KSP-I might be included.
